name: ZomBuster (itch)
description:
This is My 2D shooter Project

Modification

  • Changed the GUI to make it match the theme of  the game
  • Changed the Characters in the game
  • Created a Unique Enemy behaviour which kills the players as soon as the zombie comes closer
  • Created New Death effects for The enemies.

Thats it...I was a short time ....Will try to make it better next time✌🏻
